Package it.uniba.piece

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
it.uniba.piece.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public class Piece
extends java.lang.Object
This is the class of piece
Responsibility
This class can:
- define pieces characteristics
- define pieces feature
This class know:
- nothing

This class is " entity ".
